Welcome to ISA

The Indian Students' Association (ISA) â€“ a non-profit organization.

Find Out More

We promote rich Indian culture and heritage.

We help new students to feel comfortable by resolving their queries before and after they arrive, introduce them to the city, provide airport pickups and temporary accommodation, help getting on campus jobs, etc.

We provide up to 6 scholarships every year to our registered members.

We have different events through out the year to cheer them up between the stress of studies, exams and assignments.
